name: Sour Willie
description: Sour Willie is a sativa cross between Sour Diesel and Willie Nelson. These dense buds have a pungent diesel aroma with fruity and spicy undertones, and deliver racing heady effects with a physical buzz, making it a great daytime choice.
attributes_title: Happy, Hungry, Aroused, Euphoric, Uplifted, Depression, Lack of Appetite, Pain, Stress, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Headache, Anxious, Dizzy
